sliders.label: 2.8 Gpc box, showing a 20 Mpc thick slice through the full box and various quantities: gas (combined temperature and surface density), CDM (dark matter surface density), stars (stellar surface density) and neutrinos (neutrino surface density). All quantities are shown using a logarithmic colour scale to visualise faint structures.
